data.title: Alleghany County, Virginia
data.text:
Subdivision Review Fees: Subdivisions, as defined $200.00 per plat plus $2.00 per lot Subdivision Exemptions: Family Splits, as defined $50.00 per plat plus $2.00 per lot Large Lot Divisions, as defined $50.00 per plat plus $2.00 per lot Two Lot Divisions, as defined $50.00 per plat plus $2.00 per lot Minor Divisions, as defined $50.00 per plat, plus $2.00 per lot Other $50.00 per plat plus $2.00 per lot Boundary Adjustment $50.00 per plat plus $2.00 per lot Vacation of Plats $100.00 per plat plus $2.00 per lot, not to exceed $150.00 Zoning Fees: Special Use (BOS) $200.00 Special Exception (BZA) $200.00 Variance (BZA) $200.00 Rezoning and Conditional Rezoning $400.00 per application plus $15.00 per acre over 5 acres (PC and BOS) Residential Planned Unit Development PUD $400.00 per application plus $15.00 per acre over 5 acres (PC and BOS) Appeal (BZA) $200.00 Use Not Provided For (PC and BOS) $300.00 Zoning Approval for Building Permit $50.00 Zoning Approval for Business License

Site Plan Review of Building Permits

Zoning Confirmation Letters & Confirm Non-Conforming Status of Parcel

$20.00

$20.00

$50.00

Non-Conforming Uses No Fee (Fees amended by the Board of Supervisors, July 6, 2021 by R-21-51) Copies of Documents: Zoning Ordinance $10.00 Subdivision Ordinance $6.00 Water and Sewer Ordinance $10.00 Technical Specifications for Water and Sewer $5.00 Water and Sewer Study $125.00 Comprehensive Plan $15.00 Capital Improvement Plan $10.00 Audit $10.00 Budget $10.00 County Code $100.00 (bound) $50.00 (unbound)
